meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7093.

td.p: Tom Landvatter, a professor from Valparaiso, Indiana
Kevin Ruby, a technical writer from San Diego, California
Brennan Bushee, an operations analyst from Malden, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $57,202)

tr.td: GRISHAM, CRICHTON OR CLANCY
GOVERNMENT AGENCIES
FOOTBALL HEROES
THE 11th CENTURY
TOO MUCH INFORMATION
"TMI"

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
